20110127023602.000|20110127023602.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SNOWPLOW DRIVER JOE
20110127023602.000|20110127023606.000|CC1|COLABRO SWEARS BY IT.

20110127023607.000|20110127023608.000|CC1|>> GOOD INVENTION.              
20110127023608.000|20110127023611.000|CC1|IT COSTS THE TOWN NOTHING.      
20110127023611.000|20110127023613.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN SYRACUSE, NEW   
20110127023613.000|20110127023614.000|CC1|YORK, THEY'RE MIXING BEET JUICE 
20110127023614.000|20110127023615.000|CC1|WITH ROCK SALT.                 
20110127023615.000|20110127023616.000|CC1|THE JUICE ACTS AS AN INSULATION 
20110127023616.000|20110127023617.000|CC1|TO THE SALT, MAKING IT MORE     
20110127023617.000|20110127023618.000|CC1|EFFECTIVE IN COLD WEATHER.

20110127024449.000|20110127024449.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110127024449.000|20110127024450.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110127024450.000|20110127024452.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110127024452.000|20110127024452.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110127024452.000|20110127024456.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110127024455.000|20110127024455.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:11:00 of 1:30:00
20110127024456.000|20110127024456.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110127024456.000|20110127024458.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110127024458.000|20110127024500.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110127024500.000|20110127024502.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110127024502.000|20110127024502.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110127024502.000|20110127024504.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110127024504.000|20110127024504.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110127024504.000|20110127024506.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110127024506.000|20110127024506.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110127024506.000|20110127024509.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110127024509.000|20110127024510.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110127024510.000|20110127024510.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110127024510.000|20110127024512.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110127024512.000|20110127024512.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110127024512.000|20110127024514.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110127024514.000|20110127024514.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110127024514.000|20110127024517.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110127024517.000|20110127024517.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110127024517.000|20110127024520.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110127024520.000|20110127024520.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110127024520.000|20110127024521.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110127024521.000|20110127024521.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110127024521.000|20110127024523.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110127024523.000|20110127024525.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110127024525.000|20110127024525.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110127024525.000|20110127024527.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110127024527.000|20110127024527.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110127024527.000|20110127024529.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110127024529.000|20110127024530.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110127024530.000|20110127024530.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110127024530.000|20110127024532.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110127024532.000|20110127024532.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110127024532.000|20110127024534.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110127024534.000|20110127024534.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110127024534.000|20110127024537.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110127024537.000|20110127024538.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110127024538.000|20110127024538.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110127024538.000|20110127024541.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110127024541.000|20110127024541.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110127024541.000|20110127024543.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110127024543.000|20110127024543.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110127024543.000|20110127024545.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110127024545.000|20110127024545.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110127024545.000|20110127024547.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110127024547.000|20110127024547.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110127024547.000|20110127024549.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110127024549.000|20110127024549.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110127024549.000|20110127024552.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110127024552.000|20110127024553.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110127024553.000|20110127024555.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110127024555.000|20110127024555.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110127024555.000|20110127024558.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110127024558.000|20110127024558.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110127024558.000|20110127024600.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110127024600.000|20110127024600.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110127024600.000|20110127024624.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.

20110127024624.000|20110127024626.000|CC1|>>> AND NOW, WE WANT TO TELL YOU
20110127024626.000|20110127024628.000|CC1|ABOUT AN IMPORTANT HEALTH       
20110127024628.000|20110127024629.000|CC1|WARNING TONIGHT FROM THE FDA    
20110127024629.000|20110127024630.000|CC1|ABOUT A POSSIBLE LINK BETWEEN   
20110127024630.000|20110127024631.000|CC1|BREAST IMPLANTS AND A RARE FORM 
20110127024631.000|20110127024632.000|CC1|OF CANCER.                      
20110127024632.000|20110127024634.000|CC1|THE LATEST IN A LONG LINE OF    
20110127024634.000|20110127024636.000|CC1|CONCERNS ABOUT BREAST IMPLANTS. 
20110127024636.000|20110127024637.000|CC1|LISA STARK REPORTS THAT         
20110127024637.000|20110127024638.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS ARE NOW ALERTING  
20110127024638.000|20110127024640.000|CC1|WOMEN AND THEIR DOCTORS.        
20110127024640.000|20110127024641.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE WARNING        
20110127024641.000|20110127024643.000|CC1|INVOLVES BOTH SALINE AND        
20110127024643.000|20110127024645.000|CC1|SILICONE BREAST IMPLANTS.       
20110127024645.000|20110127024646.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT SAYS THEY MAY BE 
20110127024646.000|20110127024649.000|CC1|LINKED TO A RARE FORM OF        
20110127024649.000|20110127024650.000|CC1|LYMPHOMA, A CANCER OF THE IMMUNE
20110127024650.000|20110127024653.000|CC1|SYSTEM.                         
20110127024653.000|20110127024655.000|CC1|THERE ARE SOME 60 CASES         
20110127024655.000|20110127024656.000|CC1|WORLDWIDE IN AS MANY AS 10      
20110127024656.000|20110127024657.000|CC1|MILLION WOMEN WITH IMPLANTS.    
20110127024657.000|20110127024658.000|CC1|THAT MAY NOT SOUND LIKE MUCH,   
20110127024658.000|20110127024659.000|CC1|BUT IT'S DRAMATICALLY HIGHER    
20110127024659.000|20110127024701.000|CC1|THAN THE RISK OF THE DISEASE    
20110127024701.000|20110127024701.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:13:00 of 1:30:00
20110127024701.000|20110127024704.000|CC1|AMONG WOMEN WITHOUT IMPLANTS.   
20110127024704.000|20110127024705.000|CC1|THE LYMPHOMA CAN DEVELOP YEARS, 
20110127024705.000|20110127024707.000|CC1|EVEN DECADES, AFTER THE IMPLANTS
20110127024707.000|20110127024709.000|CC1|ARE PUT IN, THE CANCER SHOWING  
20110127024709.000|20110127024711.000|CC1|UP IN FLUID AND SCAR TISSUE.    
20110127024711.000|20110127024713.000|CC1|>> WE DON'T WANT WOMEN TO PANIC,
20110127024713.000|20110127024714.000|CC1|THEY SHOULDN'T PANIC.           
20110127024714.000|20110127024718.000|CC1|BUT IF THEY'RE HAVING SYMPTOMS, 
20110127024718.000|20110127024719.000|CC1|THEY SHOULD ABSOLUTELY GO TO SEE
20110127024719.000|20110127024719.000|CC1|A DOCTOR.                       
20110127024719.000|20110127024721.000|CC1|>> Reporter: SYMPTOMS CAN       
20110127024721.000|20110127024723.000|CC1|INCLUDE SWELLING, PAIN, LUMPS OR
20110127024723.000|20110127024725.000|CC1|ASYMMETRY OF THE BREASTS.       
20110127024725.000|20110127024727.000|CC1|THE FDA SAYS WOMEN WITH NO      
20110127024727.000|20110127024729.000|CC1|SYMPTOMS SHOULD SIMPLY CONTINUE 
20110127024729.000|20110127024729.000|CC1|WITH THEIR REGULAR MEDICAL      
20110127024729.000|20110127024731.000|CC1|CHECK-UPS.                      
20110127024731.000|20110127024732.000|CC1|THEY ARE NOT RECOMMENDING THEY  
20110127024732.000|20110127024734.000|CC1|REMOVE THEIR IMPLANTS.          
20110127024734.000|20110127024735.000|CC1|THIS IS YET ANOTHER TWIST IN THE
20110127024735.000|20110127024736.000|CC1|TORTURED HISTORY OF BREAST      
20110127024736.000|20110127024739.000|CC1|IMPLANT SAFETY.

20110127024742.000|20110127024745.000|CC1|CONCERNED THEY COULD CAUSE

20110127024755.000|20110127024756.000|CC1|DANGER.                         
20110127024756.000|20110127024758.000|CC1|>> I WANT PATIENTS OUT THERE
